comments.content: It looks like a Bodoni somebody has had their way with - i.e. stretched it way out.
I'm sure ANN TAYLOR is pre-digital and might have been hand drawn. Having said that maybe someone has a thought on something close. If you need the actual logo there are some Russian Logo sites.
thanks. i've checked the logo site and the tons of logo books we have here at work but no dice. thanks for the help though. in the meantime i'll just kill bodoni by stretching it...ouch!

This is probably a custom job, as already pointed out, but URW's [Craw Modern](http://web.archive.org/web/20111229205519/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/craw-modern/urw-t-regular/testdrive.html?s=A%20N%20N%20%20%20T%20A%20Y%20L%20O%20R&p=36) will get you close.
